item.title: Deal of the Day – Dell Inspiron 17R 4th-gen Core i7 “Haswell” 1080p laptop with a free $200 gift card
item.description: LogicBUY’s Deal for Wednesday is the 17.3″ Dell Inspiron 17R (5737) Core i7 “Haswell” Dual-core laptop for $999.99. You’ll also receive a $200 Dell eGift card with this purchase. Features: 16GB RAM 1TB hard drive, 8-in-1 card reader 1080p anti-glare LCD, Intel HD 4400 graphics 802.11n WiFi, Bluetooth 4.0 HDMI v1.4a port, two USB 3.0 ports 12-month McAfee […]
item.content:encoded:
LogicBUY’s Deal for Wednesday is the 17.3″ Dell Inspiron 17R (5737) Core i7 “Haswell” Dual-core laptop for $999.99.  You’ll also receive a $200 Dell eGift card with this purchase.  Features:

  • 16GB RAM
  • 1TB hard drive, 8-in-1 card reader
  • 1080p anti-glare LCD, Intel HD 4400 graphics
  • 802.11n WiFi, Bluetooth 4.0
  • HDMI v1.4a port, two USB 3.0 ports
  • 12-month McAfee Live Safe subscription
  • Windows 8

$1319.99 – $320 instant savings = $999.99 with free shipping.

This deal expires September 4, 2013 or sooner. Check the above link for more details on this deal, and check the LogicBUY home page for other deals.

Filed in categories: Deals

Tagged: Sponsored Posts

Deal of the Day – Dell Inspiron 17R 4th-gen Core i7 “Haswell” 1080p laptop with a free $200 gift card originally appeared on The Gadgeteer on August 28, 2013 at 10:15 am.
